name: Twisted Fingers
description:
TWISTED FINGERS - 1VS1 Only !

Twisted Fingers is a 1 VS 1 plateformer-racing game about obselecence.

During the game, some of your keyboard keys will stop working. You'll have to bind your newly unbinded action to another Key.

Win Stars by finishing first or surviving your opponent. First to 3 stars wins the game !

Wall Jump and punches are a thing !

A Game made in 48h for HDCJam 2015.

Theme : Obsolecence

Made by Half a Grain : Calvin Charbit & Thibaut Mereu

With assets from : Maesai & Kenney

and Music from : 8bit Empire by Ozzed

Engine : Construct 2

Given more time, we would have added a visual representation of the keyboard keys already used and the one currenty selected.

We would also have added a way for the player to know wich keys he is currentrly using.

Also, the more you fail to progress because of you keyboard, the more it get scrambbled. Bad Designer, bad.
